articles.title: Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Power Station
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Power Station
Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il  provided field guidance to Ryesonggang Youth Power Station No. 1 which was newly built and commissioned in October last year.
					 He mounted an observation platform where he enjoyed a bird's-eye view of the power station and acquainted himself in detail with its construction and electricity production.
					
					 A world-startling gigantic power station has appeared in this place where only the sound of the flowing water of the River Ryesong could be heard just a few years ago, he said, adding that this eye-opening change clearly showed the inexhaustible mental power and the might of creative ingenuity of the Korean people firmly armed with the Juche idea.
					
					 The power station has been built ideally in all aspects ranging from its designing to its construction as required by technological engineering, he said, stressing that this power station is, indeed, a wonderful structure to be proud of as it meets all requirements of the new century.
					
					 After being briefed on the power station before a huge painting showing a panoramic view of the station, he went round a generator room and an electricity distribution room.
					
					 Noting that the country is prospering thanks to the do-or-die spirit of the Korean people ready to flatten even a mountain and empty even a sea at one go when called for by the Party and the might of the single-minded unity stronger than any weapon, he stressed that the Korean people will certainly fly the red flag of the victory on the eminence of a great prosperous powerful nation thanks to this inexhaustible mental power.
					
					 He stressed the need for the builders to complete the power station No. 2 and other remaining project ahead of schedule by ceaselessly putting spurs to them in the same spirit as they displayed in building the power station No. 1 in a short span of time and specified tasks to be fulfilled to wind up them and ways to do so. 
					
					 He advanced the tasks to be carried out to boost the nation's electricity production.
					
					 The shortest cut to satisfactorily meeting the steadily growing need for electricity in our country with many rivers and streams is to construct hydro-power stations on a large-scale, he noted, underlining the necessity to pay primary attention to the hydraulic power generation. 
					
					 He said that the construction of a hydro-power station is a difficult project but very economical because it serves as a treasure of eternal value and requires less expenses for its management and less labor force, once it is completed. 
					
					 He pointed out that many minor hydro-power stations were built by the army and society in recent years to bring great benefits to them, underscoring the need to keep holding fast to the Party's policy for simultaneously building large hydro-power stations and minor ones.
					
					 Now that a lot of thermal power plants with large output have been built in various parts of the country thanks to the Party's policy for constructing thermal power plants along with hydro-power stations, it is necessary to give fullest play to their capacity, he said, emphasizing that to this end it is necessary to conduct the overhaul of the generating equipment in a planned manner and sufficiently supply coal to them. 
					
					 Noting that today when the army and people are close to the gate to a great prosperous powerful nation they have launched a final charge with optimism about victory and extraordinary fighting spirit, he called on the whole Party and army and all the people to turn out as one and bring about a great upswing on all fronts in order to bring earlier the day of victory in the struggle for building a thriving nation.
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, chief secretary of the North Hwanghae Provincial Committee of the WPK, Pak Nam Ki and Jang Song Thaek, department directors of the C.C., the WPK, and Ri Je Gang and Ri Jae Il, first vice department directors of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects KPA Sub-Unit
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects KPA Sub-Unit
Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il inspected a sub-unit of KPA Unit 131 honored with the title of the O Jung Hup-led Seventh Regiment.
					 He dropped in at a military lecture room and acquainted himself with the training at the sub-unit before watching its soldiers' training.
					
					 After watching the training, he expressed satisfaction over the fact that all the servicepersons have grown to be stalwart fighters firmly prepared politically and ideologically and in military technique to shatter any surprise invasion of the enemy at a single blow and reliably defend the socialist homeland and set forth the tasks to be carried out to increase the sub-unit's combat capability. 
					
					 The KPA, which has inherited the brilliant traditions of the anti-Japanese war, has grown to be the invincible revolutionary ranks all members of which devotedly defend the Party and the leader and unhesitatingly dedicate even their lives to the cause of the Party and the socialist cause, he said, adding that it is the great pride of the WPK and the people to have such matchless great army.
					
					 He took warm care of the living of the servicepersons, going round various places of the sub-unit.
					
					 He showed profound care for the servicepersons, acquainting himself with their overall life down to details ranging from the use of CDs and publications to the temperature in their bedrooms and their cultural and emotional life and sideline farming.
					
					 He was very pleased to learn that the sub-units of the unit greatly benefit from the operation of pig farms as it has been put on a normal footing, stressing the need for all the units to continue paying deep attention to the supply service.
					
					 He praised the commanding officers for having made persevering efforts to provide soldiers with more abundant diet.
					
					 He had a photo session with the servicepersons of the sub-unit.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Generals Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su and other commanding officers of the army.

articles.title: Protocol Signed between DPRK and Slovakia
articles.content:
Protocol Signed between DPRK and Slovakia
Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- A protocol on modifying and supplementing the agreement on the promotion and protection of investment between the governments of the DPRK and the Slovak Republic was signed in Bratislava on Jan. 27.
					 The protocol was signed by DPRK Ambassador to Slovakia Ri Pyong Gap and Slovak Minister of Finance Jan Pocatek.

articles.title: New Posters Produced
articles.content:
New Posters Produced
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- New posters were produced on the occasion of the election of deputies to the 12th Supreme People's Assembly.
					 The posters created by the Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House "Let us all vote for the candidates!" and "Let us demonstrate the might of the single-minded unity to the whole world!" depict the servicepersons and people of the DPRK full of patriotic enthusiasm to consolidate the people's power as firm as a rock, united close around the Party and the leader against the background of the fluttering blue and red national flag of the Republic and so on.

articles.title: "Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works" Off Press
articles.content:
"Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works" Vol. 79 Off Press
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House brought out Volume 79 of "Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works" which systematically and comprehensively deals with the works of President Kim Il Sung in chronological order.
					 The book contains 43 works, including speeches, talks and instructions made by the President between January and June, Juche 73 (1984.)
					
					 Among them are such works as "On Some Problems Arising in the Economic Work at Present", "New Year Address", "On Improving the Standard of the People's Living and Developing Foreign Affairs and Medical Technology" and "On Further Developing Economic Collaboration and Technological Exchange." These works lay down the policy of effecting a turn in the socialist economic construction and ways to implement it, the policy of radically improving the standard of the people's living and tasks to be fulfilled to carry it out.
					
					 "A Talk to the Chairman of the Social Democratic Party of Denmark" and "A Talk to a Delegation from the Soviet News Agency TASS" and other works clarify the most fair and aboveboard and realistic proposals and ways for accomplishing the cause of national reunification including the issue of forcing the U.S. troops to withdraw from south Korea, the issue of replacing the Armistice Agreement signed between the DPRK and the U.S. by a peace agreement and the issue of reunifying the country by way of founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo. 
					
					 "A Congratulatory Message to the 4th Conference of the Active Propagandists within the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan", "On Successfully Training Young Cadres within the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan" and his other works indicate highly important guidelines to be held fast to by Chongryon in its activities and patriotic work. "A Speech Made at the Pyongyang City Mass Meeting for Welcoming the General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China" and his other works give perfect answers to the theoretical and practical problems arising in accomplishing the cause of global independence.
					
					 The book also contains works dealing with the issue of underscoring the need for the officials to fulfill their responsibility and role as leading members of the revolution and faithful servants of the people, the issue of energetically pushing forward the land development to make the country more beautiful and richer and the issue of taking good care of the nutrition of the children.

articles.title: Delegation of Chongryon Officials Arrives
articles.content:
Delegation of Chongryon Officials Arrives
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- A delegation of officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) led by Vice-Chairman of its Central Standing Committee Pak Ku Ho arrived here Saturday by air to visit the socialist homeland.

articles.title: U.S. Loudmouthed "Nuclear Disarmament" Termed Hypocritical
articles.content:
U.S. Loudmouthed "Nuclear Disarmament" Termed Hypocritical
Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The Carnegie Endowment for International Peace disclosed in a report that the United States appropriated at least 52.4 billion U.S. dollars for the development and modernization of nuclear weapons last year.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a signed commentary in this regard: This provides a scientific testimony proving that the U.S. is pushing forward the development and reinforcement of modern type nuclear weapons behind the smokescreen of "nuclear disarmament."
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The U.S. pretends to be "interested" in the world peace and "nuclear disarmament" on one hand while putting spurs to the development of new type nuclear weapons by spending a stupendous amount of funds on the other. This behavior is nothing but a criminal act to hold an unchallenged nuclear edge and brandish a nuclear stick in a bid to bring a horrible nuclear disaster to humankind and an act of going against the trend of the present times toward peace.
					
					 The U.S. brands others' acts of acquiring deterrent to cope with the U.S. nuclear threat as "crimes" and, at the same time, groundlessly charges other countries engaged in nuclear activities for peaceful purposes with "the development of nuclear weapons."
					
					 This behavior of the U.S. is an expression of its outrageous policy based on double standards in the nuclear issue and the height of its arrogance. 
					
					 For the U.S. nuclear weapons are neither something for decoration nor something for display nor something for self-defense. They are means for war and world domination from A to Z.
					
					 The "nuclear disarmament" touted by the U.S. is a version of a nuclear war scenario. It seeks to achieve its ulterior aim while accelerating the moves for development and modernization of new type nuclear weapons under the smokescreen of "nuclear disarmament."
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to face up to the trend of the times and stop playing a "nuclear hide-and-seek game."

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group Denounced for Bedeviling Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group Denounced for Bedeviling Inter-Korean Relations
Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea issued a statement as regards the uncontrollable grave situation in which the inter-Korean relations have been put to the extremes of confrontation in political and military fields. This is a very just step to check the reckless moves of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors running headlong towards the confrontation with fellow countrymen and provocation of a war of aggression against the DPRK and defend the common interests of the nation.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a signed commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The south Korean authorities totally denied and nullified the historic inter-Korean declarations, thus pushing the north-south relations into a quagmire in gross violation of the agreements common to the nation. This is a blatant challenge to the nation's will for reunification.
					
					 The DPRK, proceeding from its important mission for the country and the nation, put forward a lot of reasonable ways and proposals to create favorable circumstance for national reconciliation and unity and reunification of the country by defusing the political and military confrontation between the north and the south and rooting out the source of war and has made every possible effort for their materialization.
					
					 However, all the agreements between the north and the south have been reduced to dead documents due to the Lee Myung Bak group's moves for confrontation and war which went beyond the limit. The group is challenging the DPRK by force of arms, even claiming that they would not rule out mounting a preemptive attack on it. Under this situation, there is no need for the DPRK to remain bound to the past inter-Korean agreements.
					
					 The Lee group will never evade its responsibility for having driven the north-south confrontation into an extremity but should pay dearly for it.
					
					 There is no future for those mad in confrontation, and they are to be cursed for all ages. This truth will surely be proven by history.

articles.title: "Dialogue and Cooperation" Touted by Lee Myung Bak Group Dismissed
articles.content:
"Dialogue and Cooperation" Touted by Lee Myung Bak Group Dismissed
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- Of late traitor Lee Myung Bak again trumpeted about "co-existence and co-prosperity," blustering that he "would solve the issue concerning the north from a long-term viewpoint." Meanwhile, mandarins of the "Ministry of Unification" cried out for "deepening the sympathy" with the "policy of co-existence and co-prosperity," talking about what they called "dialogue" and "cooperation."
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is no more than a deceptive artifice employed by those who pushed the inter-Korean relations to total severance and the phase of confrontation to justify their acts of treachery.
					
					 The Lee group pays lip service to "dialogue and cooperation" and "co-existence and co-prosperity" whenever a chance presents itself, but they have never sounded true. 
					
					 Puppet army brasshats held a "joint seminar" to kick up war hysteria from the outset of the year. It is against this backdrop that war exercises including the "severe winter drill" simulating an actual battle are taking place throughout south Korea almost every day.
					
					 What merits a serious attention is that the Lee group keeps talking about "dialogue and cooperation" and "co-existence and co-prosperity," feigning ignorance of the acts of giving spurs to establishing a treacherous fascist system after working out a scenario for all-out confrontation with the north. 
					
					 The "dialogue and cooperation" and "co-existence and co-prosperity" advertised by them are, in essence, a replica of the watchwords "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars" which have already gone bankrupt. 
					
					 "Dialogue and co-prosperity" and "deepening sympathy" and the like oft-repeated by them without uttering a single word about the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, the reunification programmes common to the nation, are a mockery of the desire of the compatriots for reunification and prosperity and the demand of the times and an unpardonable act of treachery.
					
					 The Lee group would be well advised to stop its poor wordplay and roll back at once its policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 Its treacherous deceptive artifice would get it nowhere.

articles.title: DPRK-Targeted War Exercises Flailed
articles.content:
DPRK-Targeted War Exercises Flailed
Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the warmongers of the puppet south Korean army are becoming all the more frantic in their moves for confrontation and a war of aggression against the DPRK while openly calling for "sanctions" and "use of military force" against it from the outset of the new year, according to a military source.
					 Shortly ago, troops, tanks, armored vehicles and artillery pieces of the Second Division of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces in south Korea were busy with joint ground firepower striking exercises. The combat air brigade belonging to the U.S. Second Division has staged air firepower striking exercises since Jan. 14.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists staged madcap war exercises for invading the DPRK by mobilizing their huge air and ground forces in south Korea with all its areas as an operational theatre from Jan. 12 to 17.
					
					 Overseas-based aircraft with various missions were deployed in the U.S. air-force bases in south Korea one after another. On Jan. 14 and 16 more than 580 planes with various missions were busy with exercises for striking targets in the depth of the DPRK and close air support and air warfare exercises.
					
					 Guam-based B-52H strategic bomber capable of making nuclear bomb attacks flew into the air above south Korea to frequently stage the dangerous drills of dropping bombs before flying back to its base.
					
					 A vehicle-transporting ship and a large cargo ship of the navy of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces dropped its anchor at Ryosu Port on Jan. 16 and at Pusan Port on Jan. 22 respectively to get familiar with sea routes and conduct the drill of loading and discharging war materiel. 
					
					 The war maniacs of the puppet military of south Korea staged war exercises aimed at rounding off the methods of combat actions according to phases pursuant to the OPLAN "5027-04" for invading the DPRK and examining the feasibility of joint operations and "severe winter training" under the simulated conditions of an actual war from Jan. 7 to 24, fanning up the atmosphere for launching an aggression on the DPRK.
					
					 The puppet navy staged joint strike exercises combined with live shell firing drill between Jan. 5 and 9. On Jan. 14 it conducted drills for urgent sailing and operation formation and firepower attack with the waters off Yonphyong Islet as an operation theatre. It deployed two more warships in these waters on Jan. 20. 
					
					 Due to the frantic moves of the U.S. imperialists and the warmongers of the puppet military for a war of aggression on the DPRK, the situation on the Korean Peninsula reached such pass that a thermonuclear war is unavoidable and the desire of the Koreans for security and peaceful reunification is being ruthlessly dampened.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet army warmongers should properly know who their rival is and behave themselves and halt at once their anti-DPRK war moves.

articles.title: More than 180 Cases of Aerial Espionage against DPRK in January
articles.content:
More than 180 Cases of Aerial Espionage against DPRK in January
Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialist warmongers and the south Korean puppets frantically committed aerial espionage against the DPRK in January by mobilizing strategic and tactical reconnaissance planes with various missions, according to a military source. The U.S. imperialist aggressor forces perpetrated at least 110 cases of aerial espionage and the south Korean puppet armed forces more than 70 cases in January. 
					 On Jan.31 U-2 took off the air force base of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in Osan, south Korea to spy on the DPRK's strategic targets. The number of the cases of such aerial espionage conducted by the plane reached 27 in January.
					
					 12 RC-12s of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces performed such espionage mission on Jan. 4 and their overseas-based E-3 committed such aerial espionage against the DPRK on Jan. 7, 12, 16 and 21.
					
					 On Jan. 20 and 28 nine different type tactical reconnaissance and commanding planes of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces and the south Korean puppet armed forces were busy with intensive aerial espionage against the DPRK.
					
					 Meanwhile, two or three RC-800s and RF-4Cs of the south Korean puppet warmongers made shuttle flights day and night almost everyday to perpetrate aerial observation and espionage against the DPRK.
					
					 These reckless acts of aerial espionage perpetrated from the outset of the new year compel the DPRK to further increase the readiness to cope with the moves of the U.S. imperialists and the warmongers of the south Korean puppet army for a war of aggression.

articles.title: Struggle to Force Dictatorial Regime to Step Down Called for
articles.content:
Struggle to Force Dictatorial Regime to Step Down Called for
Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The Action Headquarters of the Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration to Force the Lee Myung Bak Regime to Step Down in south Korea issued a statement on Jan. 28 calling for turning out in the struggle to force the group of traitors to step down.
					The statement denounced the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak regime for obstructing the independent reunification of the Korean nation by persisting in the moves for escalating the confrontation with the DPRK. It accused the Lee Myung Bak regime of putting up the watchwords "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars," a version of the successive dictatorial regimes' theory calling for "unification through absorption."
					
					 The statement blasted Lee Myung Bak for working hard to railroad a series of his evil bills opposed to the nation, reunification and democracy and unhesitatingly killing even evacuees in Ryongsan.
					
					 It called on the youth and students to wage a dynamic struggle to make a clean sweep of the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak regime and other anti-reunification forces and get such evil laws as the "National Security Law" repealed as soon as possible.
					
					 The statement demanded the earliest possible resignation of the regime which drove evacuees in Ryongsan to death, the undemocratic regime shackling all the people to Lee's evil laws and the anti-reunification regime hell-bent on the moves for a war and confrontation with fellow countrymen, pursuant to the U.S. policy.

articles.title: Statement of Spokesman for KPA General Staff Supported
articles.content:
Statement of Spokesman for KPA General Staff Supported
Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on Jan. 17 in support of the statement issued by a spokesman for the General Staff of the Korean People's Army.
					 The statement expressed full support to the decisive stand of the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK to mercilessly frustrate the evermore undisguised provocative moves of the Lee Myung Bak fascist puppet clique.
					
					 It continued:
					
					 The moves of the Lee puppet clique rendering the situation on the Korean Peninsula extremely tense in violation of the joint declarations agreed upon by the north and the south have gone beyond the danger line.
					
					 Most just is the stand of the heroic KPA to defend the socialist country of Juche as firm as an iron wall. 
					
					 We call on the adherents to the Juche idea and the progressive people around the world to positively support and encourage the Korean people in their struggle to foil the moves of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet clique against the DPRK.

articles.title: Firmado protocolo entre Corea y Eslovaquia
articles.content:
Firmado protocolo entre Corea y Eslovaquia
Pyongyang, 31 de enero (ATCC) -- Quedo concertado el dia 27 en Bratislava el protocolo entre los gobiernos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Republica de Eslovaquia relativo a la rectificacion y el suplemento del convenio sobre el fomento y proteccion de inversiones entre ambos paises.
					  Lo firmaron el embajador coreano en Eslovaquia, Ri Pyong Gap, y el ministro de Finanzas de Eslovaquia, Jan Pochatek.

articles.title: Pancartas dedicadas a elecciones de diputados a la APS
articles.content:
Pancartas dedicadas a elecciones de diputados a la APS
Pyongyang, 31 de enero (ATCC) -- Se dieron a luz  los afiches referentes a las elecciones de los diputados a la XII legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					   Los afiches creados por la Editora del Partido del Trabajo de Corea "!Que todos nosotros votemos a favor!" y "!Manifestemos a todo el mundo el poderio de la unidad monolitica!" describen los aspectos del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea llenos del entusiasmo patriotico de consolidar con mas firmeza el Poder popular, unidos monoliticamente en torno al partido y el lider tomando por fondo la flameante bandera azul marino y rojo de la RPDC, etc.

articles.title: Mas de 180 espionajes aereos de yanquis y ejercito surcoreano
articles.content:
Mas de 180 espionajes aereos de yanquis y ejercito surcoreano
Pyongyang, 31 de enero (ATCC) -- Segun fuentes castrenses, los belicistas norteamericanos y los titeres surcoreanos perpetraron en enero los actos de reconocimiento aereo contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea mediante la movilizacion de aviones de reconocimiento estrategico-tactico de distintas misiones.
					  El numero de tales espionajes aereos por los yanquis llega a mas de 110 y el de semejantes actos por el ejercito titere del Sur de Corea, a mas de 70.
					
					El dia 31, "U-2", que despego de la base aerea de Osan de las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea, se entrego freneticamente al acto espia sobre los blancos estrategicos de la RPDC.
					
					 Llega a 27 el numero de actos de espionaje aereo por esta aeronave.
					
					El dia 4, 12 aviones norteamericanos "RC-12" y los dias 7, 12, 16 y 21 el "E-3" despegado de ultramar, fueron movilizados para el mismo espionaje.
					
					Los dias 20 y 28,  los 9 aviones de reconocimiento tactico de distintas misiones y los de mando de las tropas norteamericanas y el ejercito titere surcoreano se afanaron en espionaje aereo concentrado sobre la RPDC.
					
					Por otra parte, 2 o 3 aviones "RC-800" y "RF-4C" del ejercito titere surcoreano hicieron diariamente vuelos de ida y vuelta de dia a noche para la vigilancia aerea y espionaje sobre la RPDC.
					
					Tales espionajes aereos nos exigen a hacer los preparativos necesarios frente a las maquinaciones de guerra agresiva de los imperialistas yanquis y los belicistas del ejercito titere surcoreano.

articles.title: Entidades britanicas apoyan resuelta posicion del EPC
articles.content:
Entidades britanicas apoyan resuelta posicion del EPC
Pyongyang, 31 de enero (ATCC) -- La Asociacion de Estudio de la Politica de Songun (priorizacion militar) y el Grupo de Estudio de la Idea Juche, de Gran Bretana, hicieron publica el dia 17 una declaracion conjunta en apoyo a la declaracion del portavoz del Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					  El documento expresa apoyo total a la posicion de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de Corea de frustrar implacablemente las cada dia mas abiertas maniobras provocativas de la camarilla fascista titere de Lee Myung Bak del Sur de Corea.
					
					  Agrega que sobrepasaron el limite de peligro las maniobras de esa camarilla que viola las declaraciones conjuntas acordadas entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea y agrava al extremo la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  Califica de muy justa la posicion del heroico Ejercito Popular de Corea tendente a defender de manera inexpugnable la patria socialista del Juche.
					
					  Llama a los adeptos a la idea Juche y los pueblos progresistas del mundo entero a apoyar activamente la lucha del pueblo coreano contra las maniobras anti-RPDC de los imperialistas yanquis y la camarilla titere del Sur de Corea.
